profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-04-06 15:42:19 -0400.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Use of original papers requires an appointment and is limited to the Archives' Washington, D.C., Research Center. Microfilmed materials must be consulted on microfilm. Contact Reference Services for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Correspondence; biographical material; sketchbooks; photographs; writings; exhibition catalogs and announcements; clippings; and printed material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: REEL 108: 19 letters and cards; newspaper clippings; exhibition catalogs and announcements; miscellany; writings and sketches for Lentelli's book "Do and Don't in Drawing and Form"; sketches; a photo scrapbook; and ca. 380 photographs of Lentelli, his models, family, friends, and works of art.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: REEL 3813: Biographical material, 1894-1898, consisting of 6 diplomas from the Scuola Professionale per le Arti Decorative, Bologna and from R. Istituto de Belle Arti in Bologna; correspondence; art works, consisting of 2 sketchbooks and 5 loose drawings; photographs, of Lentelli, his family, friends, studio, and works of art; printed material, including clippings; exhibition announcements and catalogs; reproductions of works of art; and miscellaneous printed material.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: 35mm microfilm reels 108 & 3813 available at Archives of American Art offices and through interlibrary loan.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Sculptor; New York, N.Y. b. Nov. 29, 1879, Bologna, Italy; d. Jan. 1, 1962, Rome

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Material on reel 108 donated 1965, anonymously; material on reel 3813 donated 1984 by Syracuse University.

controlaccess.subject: Sculpture, American
Sculptors -- New York (State) -- New York -- Interviews
